entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whati
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:12 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:12 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:12 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:12 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
